name: confident

B1 being certain of your abilities or having trust in people, plans, or the future: Be a bit more confident in yourself! They don't sound confident about the future of the industry. I'm confident of his skills as a manager. [ + that ] Are you confident that enough people will attend the event? It was a confident performance. Synonyms
assertive
assured (CONFIDENT)
self-assertive
self-assured approvingSee also
self-confident approving
